data.message: Eminem, your fan base is shit... You're music is now shit.. I bought ur MMLP2 and I only enjoy like 4 songs on there... your a illuminati puppet playing on their strings... you're real fans have moved to other rappers now you'll have to earn us back...!!!

replies.message: Real fans weren't in diapers when he came out!
that doesn't mean im not a real fan shithead.. get off his dick

Youre*
Your*

1. Learn the fucking difference. 

2. Based on your statement, you do sound like a Fuck tard. He's wearing a sobriety symbol. Illuminati symbol is an upside down triangle.
It means your a fag!  His music is still great!  And thats not a illuminati chain either idiot!  Look it up!

Your a fucking idiot. 
Eminem will never be shit, his music will always be as good as it was when he first started, his fans, are all amazing so stfu and piss off 👋

lol you fags get so mad.
